text: one in the morning and one at night
take one daily (you must have your thyroxine level checked yearly)
1 tablet taken in the morning once a week before food
two tablets now then one tablet twice daily for 5 days
two tablets tds for 3 days then one tablet daily for 5 days
two tablets tds for 3 days then daily for 5 days
apply twice daily for 1 week then once daily for 2 weeks
apply twice daily for 1 week then as needed
